task.title: Preparing the Software and Setup Utilities

context.p: The ROR integrationAWS integrationOpenStack integrationTPS5 integrationvSphere integration software and setup utilities are provided in the ROR integration package, oscm-ror-install-pack.zipAWS integration package, oscm-aws-install-pack.zipOpenStack integration package, oscm-openstack-install-pack.zipTPS5 integration package, oscm-tps5-install-pack.zipvSphere integration package, oscm-vmware-install-pack.zip. The contents of the package need to be made available in your environment as follows:

Extract the contents of the oscm-ror-install-pack.ziposcm-aws-install-pack.ziposcm-openstack-install-pack.ziposcm-tps5-install-pack.ziposcm-vmware-install-pack.zip package to a separate temporary directory on the system from where you want to install and deploy the RORAWSOpenStackTPS5vSphere integration software.
In the following sections, this directory is referred to as <install_pack_dir>.

After extraction, the following directories are available:

result.p: Adding the TPS5 libraries to the applib folder:
Specific libraries required for accessing TPS5 are not delivered in the TPS5 integration package, oscm-tps5-install-pack.zip. They must be downloaded from the TPS5 Service Portal:

ol.li: Log in to the Service Portal of your TPS5 region.
Open the Manual menu and click API Library in the Related Documents section. This starts the download of the OViSSSDK_*.zip file containing the required libraries.
Extract the .zip file to a temporary directory.
Copy the content of the OViSS_JAVASDK/lib directory to the applib subdirectory of the <install_pack_dir>/domains/app_domain directory.
